## DeepReadOnlyObject type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DeepReadOnlyObject<T> = T extends Array<infer U> ? DeepReadOnlyObject<U>[] : T extends Record<any, any> ? {
    readonly [k in keyof T]: DeepReadOnlyObject<T[k]>;
} : T;
```
